subject: World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Birmingham fans ran onto the field and threw flares at opposing supporters after Wednesday’s 2-1 English League Cup quarterfinal win over city rival Aston Villa.
snippet: Birmingham fans ran onto the field and threw flares at opposing supporters after Wednesday’s 2-1 English League Cup quarterfinal win over city rival Aston Villa.
